## Description
Brief description of changes

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature  
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update

## Testing
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] Added new tests for changes

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed
